scripts.serve: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run copy-assets &&  parcel ./src/index.html --dist-dir dist --port 4190
scripts.prebuild: if not exist dist mkdir dist && npm run copy-assets
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run deploy:clean && if not exist dist mkdir dist
scripts.deploy:apps: npm run deploy:prepare && npm run build && npm run zip && npm run push:apps && npm run deploy:clean
scripts.deploy:self: npm run deploy:prepare && npm run build && npm run zip && npm run push:self && npm run deploy:clean
